isb:document.p: This page is an archive of model definition files for biomolecular or mathematical systems that have been found to be useful or interesting in our group's research.

The filename suffix of each model definition file indicates its format. The possible formats for model definition files, and the filename suffxes of each model definition file format, are described in the Dizzy User Manual. The possible formats are:
Condensed Chemical Model Definition Language (CCMDL)
Chemical Model Definition Language (CMDL)
Systems Biology Markup Language (SBML)

p.b: The list of models is here:

ul.li: Simple stochastic model of transcription of a single gene, with two transcription factors TFA and TFB [CCMDL format]
Simple stochastic model of GAL4 system, from S. cerevisiae [CCMDL format]
